name: DFJK
description:
In DFJK, your goal is simple, get to the next level. Take control of a square using D, F, J, K as controls to move around. You have a short jump and a Longer jump. Push buttons to unlock the portals that advance you to the next stage. What awaits you at the end is nothing short of a mystery. Do you have what it takes?

Made Game In 168 Hours For Brackey's Jam!

There are probably still some glitches that i have no found! 

Thank you for all the support from :
